sqlQuery.name: bulkAnswerFilterCounts
sqlQuery.sql: WITH idsql as ##WDK_ID_SQL## SELECT ta.organism as filter_name, count(distinct ta.gene_source_id) as count FROM idsql, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta WHERE ta.source_id = idsql.source_id group by organism UNION SELECT ta.species as filter_name, count(distinct ta.gene_source_id) as count FROM idsql, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta WHERE ta.source_id = idsql.source_id group by species UNION SELECT 'AllResults' as filter_name, count(distinct ta.gene_source_id) as count FROM idsql

sqlQuery.name: countOfGenes
sqlQuery.sql: select count (distinct gene_source_id) as count from ($$WDK_ID_SQL$$)

sqlQuery.name: countOfGenesWithMissingTranscripts
sqlQuery.sql: WITH WDK_ID_SQL as $$WDK_ID_SQL$$ -- wonder if we dont want to use the prefiltered result select count (distinct m.gene_source_id) as propertyValue from ( select ta.gene_source_id, ta.source_id from apidbtuning.transcriptattributes ta, (WDK_ID_SQL) idsql_1 where idsql_1.gene_source_id = ta.gene_source_id MINUS select gene_source_id, source_id from (WDK_ID_SQL) idsql_2 --where idsql_2.matched_result = 'Y' --cannot be used in boolean steps, plus might not be needed ) m

sqlQuery.name: AllResults
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT source_id, gene_source_id, project_id, wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$

sqlQuery.name: AllOrthologGroups
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT -- /*+ NO_MERGE(t) */ i removed this hint because it doesn't seem to affect CGs -steve t.source_id, ta2.gene_source_id, t.project_id, t.wdk_weight FROM ( SELECT MAX(ta.source_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY DECODE(ta.organism, '%%primaryOrthoOrganism%%', -1, '%%secondaryOrthoOrganism%%', 0 )) AS source_id, ta.project_id, max(ca.wdk_weight) as wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ ca, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta WHERE ta.source_id = ca.source_id GROUP BY ta.orthomcl_name, ta.project_id ) t, apidbtuning.transcriptattributes ta2 where t.source_id = ta2.source_id

sqlQuery.name: OrganismGeneInstances
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ta.source_id, ta.gene_source_id, ta.project_id, ca.wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ ca, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta WHERE ta.source_id = ca.source_id AND ta.organism like $$organism$$

sqlQuery.name: DistinctGenes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT /*+ NO_MERGE(t) */ t.* FROM ( SELECT MAX(ta.source_id) AS source_id, ta.project_id, ta.gene_source_id, max(ca.wdk_weight) as wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ ca, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta WHERE ta.source_id = ca.source_id AND ta.species = $$species$$ GROUP BY ta.gene_id,ta.gene_source_id,ta.project_id ) t

sqlQuery.name: DeprecatedGenes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.source_id, c.gene_source_id, c.project_id, c.wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ c, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta where ta.source_id = c.source_id and ta.organism = 'Giardia Assemblage A isolate WB' and ta.is_deprecated = $$deprecated_genes$$

sqlQuery.name: ApiProjectInstances
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.source_id, c.gene_source_id, c.project_id, c.wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ c WHERE c.project_id = $$Project$$

sqlQuery.name: BooleanExpansion
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT gb.source_id, gb.gene_source_id, gb.project_id, c.wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ c, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes gb WHERE ta.source_id = c.source_id AND gb.gene_id = ta.gene_id

sqlQuery.name: PortalDistinctGenes
sqlQuery.sql:
SELECT /*+ NO_MERGE(t) */ t.* FROM ( SELECT orthoreps.source_id,ta2.project_id, ta2.gene_source_id, , orthoreps.wdk_weight FROM ( SELECT MAX(ta.source_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY DECODE(ta.organism, 'Plasmodium falciparum 3D7', 1, 'Plasmodium berghei strain ANKA', 2, 'Plasmodium chabaudi chabaudi', 3, 'Plasmodium knowlesi strain H', 4, 'Plasmodium vivax Sal-1', 5, 'Plasmodium yoelii yoelii str. 17X', 6,
'Trypanosoma brucei TREU927', 11, 'Leishmania braziliensis', 12, 'Leishmania infantum', 13, 'Leishmania major strain Friedlin', 14, 'Trypanosoma cruzi strain CL Brener', 15,
'Cryptosporidium parvum Iowa II', 21, 'Cryptosporidium hominis', 22, 'Cryptosporidium muris', 23, 'Cryptosporidium parvum', 24,
'Toxoplasma gondii GT1', 31, 'Toxoplasma gondii RH', 32, 'Toxoplasma gondii ME49', 33, 'Toxoplasma gondii VEG', 34, 'Neospora caninum', 35,
'Giardia lamblia ATCC 50803', 41,
'Trichomonas vaginalis G3', 51 ) ) AS source_id, max(ca.wdk_weight) as wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ ca, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta WHERE ta.source_id = ca.source_id GROUP BY ta.orthomcl_name ) orthoreps, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta2
WHERE orthoreps.source_id = ta2.source_id ) t

sqlQuery.name: AllTgResults
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ta.source_id, ta.gene_source_id, ta.project_id, ca.wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ ca, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta WHERE ta.source_id = ca.source_id AND ta.organism like 'Toxoplasma gondii%'

sqlQuery.name: TgStrainGenes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT /*+ NO_MERGE(t) */ t.* FROM ( SELECT MAX(ta.source_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY DECODE(ta.organism, 'Toxoplasma gondii ME49', 1, 'Toxoplasma gondii GT1', 2, 'Toxoplasma gondii VEG', 3, 'Toxoplasma gondii RH', 4)) AS source_id, ta.project_id, ta.gene_source_id, max(ca.wdk_weight) as wdk_weight FROM $$gene_answer$$ ca, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta WHERE ta.source_id = ca.source_id AND ta.organism like $$organism$$ GROUP BY ta.gene_source_id,ta.project_id ) t

sqlQuery.name: DetailsTgStrainIntersect
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT /*+ NO_MERGE(t) */ ca.source_id, ca.gene_source_id, ca.project_id, ca.wdk_weight FROM ( SELECT MAX(c.source_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY DECODE(c.organism, 'Toxoplasma gondii ME49', 1, 'Toxoplasma gondii GT1', 2, 'Toxoplasma gondii VEG', 3)) AS source_id FROM (SELECT gb.source_id, gb.project_id, ta.organism,ta.gene_id FROM $$gene_answer$$ cb, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes gb WHERE ta.source_id = cb.source_id AND ta.organism = $$organism$$ AND gb.gene_id = ta.gene_id INTERSECT SELECT gb.source_id, gb.project_id, gb.organism,gb.gene_id FROM $$gene_answer$$ cc, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes gb WHERE ta.source_id = cc.source_id AND ta.organism = $$organism_b$$ AND gb.gene_id = ta.gene_id ) c group by c.gene_id) t, ($$gene_answer$$) ca WHERE t.source_id = ca.source_id

sqlQuery.name: DetailsTgStrainMinus
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT /*+ NO_MERGE(t) */ ca.source_id, ca.project_id, ca.wdk_weight FROM ( SELECT MAX(d.source_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY DECODE(d.organism, 'Toxoplasma gondii ME49', 1, 'Toxoplasma gondii GT1', 2, 'Toxoplasma gondii VEG', 3)) AS source_id, d.project_id as project_id FROM (SELECT c.source_id, c.project_id,c.organism, c.gene_id FROM ( SELECT gb.source_id, gb.project_id, gb.organism, gb.gene_id FROM $$gene_answer$$ cb, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes gb WHERE ta.source_id = cb.source_id AND ta.organism = $$organism$$ AND gb.gene_id = ta.gene_id MINUS SELECT gb.source_id, gb.project_id, gb.organism, gb.gene_id FROM $$gene_answer$$ cc, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes gb WHERE ta.source_id = cc.source_id AND ta.organism = $$organism_b$$ AND gb.gene_id = ta.gene_id ) c WHERE c.organism = $$organism$$) d GROUP BY d.gene_id,d.project_id) t, ($$gene_answer$$) ca WHERE t.source_id = ca.source_id AND t.project_id = ca.project_id

sqlQuery.name: DetailsTgAllMinus
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT /*+ NO_MERGE(t) */ ca.source_id, ca.project_id, ca.wdk_weight FROM ( SELECT MAX(c.source_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY DECODE(c.organism, 'Toxoplasma gondii ME49', 1, 'Toxoplasma gondii GT1', 2, 'Toxoplasma gondii VEG', 3)) AS source_id, c.project_id FROM ( SELECT gb.source_id, gb.project_id, gb.organism, gb.gene_id FROM $$gene_answer$$ cb, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes gb WHERE ta.source_id = cb.source_id AND ta.organism like 'Toxoplasma%' AND gb.gene_id = ta.gene_id MINUS SELECT gb.source_id, gb.project_id, gb.organism, gb.gene_id FROM $$gene_answer$$ cc, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes gb WHERE ta.source_id = cc.source_id AND ta.organism = $$organism$$ AND gb.gene_id = ta.gene_id ) c group by c.gene_id,c.project_id) t, ($$gene_answer$$) ca WHERE t.source_id = ca.source_id AND t.project_id = ca.project_id

sqlQuery.name: DetailsTgAllIntersect
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT /*+ NO_MERGE(t) */ ca.source_id, ca.project_id, ca.wdk_weight FROM ( SELECT MAX(c.source_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY DECODE(ta.organism, 'Toxoplasma gondii ME49', 1, 'Toxoplasma gondii GT1', 2, 'Toxoplasma gondii VEG', 3)) AS source_id, c.project_id FROM ( SELECT gb.source_id, gb.project_id, gb.organism FROM $$gene_answer$$ cb, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes gb WHERE ta.source_id = cb.source_id AND gb.gene_id = ta.gene_id INTERSECT SELECT gb.source_id, gb.project_id, gb.organism FROM $$gene_answer$$ cc, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes ta, ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes gb WHERE ta.source_id = cc.source_id AND ta.organism = $$organism$$ AND gb.gene_id = ta.gene_id ) c group by c.gene_id,c.project_id) t, ($$gene_answer$$) ca WHERE t.source_id = ca.source_id AND t.project_id = ca.project_id
